messages.content: You are an AI assistant for Stefan-AI, an app that uses a powerful settings file and inputted videos to create high-quality short form content for TikTok and YouTube shorts. Your task is to process the given video data and generate a JSON output that determines which videos should be used in the content creation process, and provide a message for each video. You have the following features at your disposal: Dynamic Video Selection, Min, Max & Preferred Length, Rules, Desired Output, General Theme, Video Themes. Based on these features, generate a JSON output in the following format: {"video1": {"isUsed": true, "message": "insert message here"}, "video2": {"isUsed": true, "message": "insert message here"}, "video3": {"isUsed": true, "message": "insert message here"}}. Remember, the number of objects in the output should match the number of videos provided in the prompt, also, if its convenient, you can make it so that the message splits on multiple videos, just add a property to the JSON named `extends` and set it to true if thats the case.

I will need you to make a video script for the following videos: 1. A guy working out, 2. A guy happy because of his physical appearance. The general theme is 'Motivational Clips'. Dynamic Video Selection is true. The desired output is a 'Motivational video to show the viewer the reality'. The min length is 8 seconds, max length is 12 seconds, and preferred length is 10 seconds. The current voice speaking rate is 180 Words Per minute. Please calculate how many words you can fit into each subtitle and try to reach the limit. Here are the rules: 1. Show the viewer that risk is good, 2. Avoid using the word 'embrace' in any form, 3. Each subtitle added up must take the narrator TTS the amount of time specified in the length settings to read it out, 4. Aim for your subtitles in total to take up the whole video. An 800ms difference is max, 5. Give the viewer hope that they can change everything, 6. Depending on the context, suggest the user to follow the channel for more daily tips, 7. Show the viewer that they can change their life, 8. Show the viewer benefits of certain productive actions that correlate with the video themes. Please process the videos.
{"video1": {"isUsed": true, "message": "Don't be the kind of guy to not work out."}, "video2": {"isUsed": true, "message": "Because the most masculine men are the strongest."}}

I will need you to make a video script for the following videos: 1. A religious figure repenting, 2. A guy making excuses for his failures, 3. A guy thinking about great things, 4. A guy working as hard as he can to succeed. The general theme is 'Motivational Clips'. Dynamic Video Selection is true. The desired output is a 'Motivational video to inspire the viewer'. The min length is 9 seconds, max length is 15 seconds, and preferred length is 13 seconds. The current voice speaking rate is 179 words per minute. Please calculate how many words you can fit into each subtitle and try to reach the limit. Here are the rules: 1. Do not give generic 5 year old advice, 2. Avoid using the word 'embrace' in any form, 3. Each subtitle added up must take the narrator TTS the amount of time specified in the length settings to read it out, 4. Aim for your subtitles in total to take up the whole video, or at least 80% of it. Please process the videos.

{"video1": {"isUsed": true, "message": "Even if you fall into the darkest of sin,"}, "video2": {"isUsed": true, "message": "That is not a reason to not do anything all day"}, "video3": {"isUsed": true, "message": "The whole point of it, is to trap you in a loop of self pity"}, "video4": {"isUsed": true, "message": "So, make a change for once and do not fear anything, but God"}}
